section.p: The only temple in Brazen is consecrated to Molhern. It is a low stone building, artfully fashioned to reflect the style of ancient menhirs.
The priest cannot induct you into the inner mysteries of Molhern’s worship. ‘I am not senior enough for that, but I can grant blessings.’
